PRX Reference

Platform Version 2017.5.0

  • Updated JavaDocs.

Platform Version 3.0.0

  • Consumer proguard rules added.

Platform Version 2.2.0

  • TLA is added as component identifier for logging purpose.

Platform Version 1.1.0

  • Modified APIs to communicate with App infra’s REST client for making networking calls.
  • Removed dependency on Volley.

Platform Version 1.0.0

  • Added APIs to download product Asset information.
  • Added APIs to download product summary information.
  • Added APIs to download product support information.
  • First version of the component is created.

Description

PRX client is a component which communicates with PRX server to download certain product related information which are commonly used by mobile platform components such as product summary, support and asset information.

Installation

  • Maven repository based method is used to integrate “PRX Client” library with any Android app.
      At compile time, machine has to be connected with Philips network
  • Maven repository (Artifactory based) Integration: The easiest and preferred way to use these components is using maven. All dependent libraries should be downloaded from artifactory.
  • Refer integration document - Document
  • Build Config Current Version:
      compileSdkVersion 26
      buildToolsVersion ’26.0.2’
      minSdkVersion 21
      targetSdkVersion 26

Code Example - Quick integration

Refer integration document - Document
